content: For any questions, please contact your {{productName}} admin.

comment.text: This translation key provides a message to be displayed when users need assistance or have questions about their account. It instructs them to contact the admin of their {{productName}} product. This message appears in a dialog box within the client application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "الخاص بكم" (al-khaas bikum) which translates to 'yours' or 'belonging to you' is overly formal and doesn't flow naturally in this context. It's better to use a more direct phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لأي استفسارات، يُرجى التواصل مع مشرف {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation includes a space before the variable {{productName}}, which is inconsistent with the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before {{productName}} in the Greek translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'por favor ponga en contacto con' is grammatically awkward in Spanish. The 'con' is unnecessary.

The phrase 'For any questions' is better translated as 'Kysyttävää on' or 'Jos sinulla on kysymyksiä' rather than just omitting it and starting directly with 'Ole yhteydessä'. The current translation implies the question isn't actually something to be addressed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ole yhteydessä {{productName}} pääkäyttäjään, jos sinulla on kysymyksiä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'pääkäyttäjä' (admin) is technically correct, 'ylläpitäjä' might be a more commonly used and understood term for an administrator in this context, particularly in a technical setting.  'Pääkäyttäjä' is often associated with system administrator roles rather than a product admin.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ole yhteydessä {{productName}} ylläpitäjään, jos sinulla on kysymyksiä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'your {{productName}} admin' is not naturally translated as 'votre administrateur {{productName}}'. A more natural translation would be 'votre administrateur {{productName}}' or 'l'administrateur {{productName}} de votre compte'.
The Armenian translation uses a lowercase 'ի' after 'ձեր'. It should be an uppercase 'Ի' because it begins a proper noun (productName).
The phrase "contacte o seu administrador" is a slightly awkward translation. A more natural Portuguese phrasing would be "entre em contato com seu administrador".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Entre em contato com seu administrador.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Vă invităm să contactați {{productName}} administratorul dvs pentru orice întrebări' is a bit formal and doesn't directly translate the meaning of 'For any questions, please contact...'. 'Vă invităm să contactați' (We invite you to contact) is not the most natural phrasing. A more direct and natural translation would be 'Pentru orice întrebări, vă rugăm să contactați...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru orice întrebări, vă rugăm să contactați {{productName}} administratorul dvs.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිපාලක' (paripalaka) is a somewhat formal term for 'admin.' While technically correct, a more common and approachable term might be preferred for a customer-facing message.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'අධිකාරි' (adhikaari) or 'ලේඛම්වරයා' (lekhamvarayaa) instead of 'පරිපාලක' depending on the intended tone and context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'За било каква питања, обратите се свом {{productName}} ' is incomplete. It's missing the word 'admin' which is present in the English content. It also lacks a proper closing to the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За било каква питања, обратите се свом {{productName}} администратору.
